# Gender Disparities in Hiring & Political Influence

A Data-Driven 2024 Job Market Analysis  

Our project explores how gender, political context, and industry trends interact to shape opportunities in the modern U.S. job market.  
Using Lightcast job postings, FRED economic indicators, and academic research, we provide a comprehensive analytical perspective.
